content.rendered:
A unique combination of luxury, comfort and tranquility in North Cyprus
In the heart of Tatlisu, a favorite of Northern Cyprus, “The Resort Phase 5”, the most
Resort Group’s most prestigious project, offers you a luxurious life beyond standards.
beyond standards. As a Resort Group, we identify our brand with innovation, aesthetics and craftsmanship.
innovation, aesthetics and craftsmanship, and offer you the quality that we have
has achieved in the construction sector as an art form.
As a Resort Group, we are leaders in the construction industry because of our
highest standards of construction quality and the exceptional
opportunities we offer. As of 2018, our group companies Tyrell

Following the successful completion of the four phases of the Resort project, we are creating a
a unique life in North Cyprus with our seaside project.
“Resort Village”, which we have combined with aesthetics and quality.
In North Cyprus, the pearl of the Mediterranean with great potential, the
Resort Phase 5 offers investors unrivaled opportunities. We do not
just promise a home; we create beautiful living spaces where you can make money while investing.
can make money by investing, whether it’s a vacation home or a permanent
income. Through our unwavering commitment to design and quality, we
offer you the perfect vacation home or the perfect investment
opportunity. Take your place now at The Resort Phase 5, which is making
your dreams come true.

Our wide selection of residences, consisting of villas and apartments, offers an extraordinary living experience, distinguished by modern and elegant design.
extraordinary living experiences, highlighted by modern and elegant
design. All our residences have ceilings at least 3.5 meters high,
creating a sense of spaciousness, and are designed to provide
maximum comfort and luxury.

3.5 meter high ceilings

Fully inclusive furniture package

Bosch appliances

3-level operating SPA multi-complex

Own beach with a bar, children’s area, sun beds and restaurant on the
pier
Infrastructure and amenities :

Outdoor swimming pools with recreation areas

Indoor heated pool

Fitness center: exercise machines, pilates

Sauna 3 types and salt chamber

Yoga studio

Beauty salon

Ice generator

SPA complex

Beachside restaurant and bar with open movie theater

Children’s playground

Outdoor parking lots

Equipped beach strip

Cab service

Concierge service

Management Company

Generator

Location
Korineum Golf Club (20 minutes)
Alagadi Turtle Beach (25 min.)
Bellapais (35 min.)
Kyrenia Harbor (40 min.)
Ercan Airport (40 min.)
Famagusta (40 minutes)

Apartment square:
Ground 1+1 with swimming pool
NET 45 m2
Terrace with private garden 30 m2
1 floor 1+1 with terrace
NET 45 m2
Balcony 7 m2
Terrace 47 m2
Apartments with design package + Bosch appliances as a gift.

MAIN REASONS TO INVEST IN THE RESORT

VERY ATTRACTIVE REAL ESTATE PRICES

HIGH RETURN ON INVESTMENT

MINIMAL TRANSPORTATION FEES

VERY SAFE COMMUNITIES

EASY ACCESS FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD

LOW COST OF LIVING

EXCELLENT CAPITAL APPRECIATION FOR INVESTORS LOOKING FOR RESALES

WONDERFUL WEATHER

Payment Plan :
Booking-2000 GBP
Down payment -40%
Further installment until completion of construction
Start of construction: July 2024.
Completion: July 2026.
